subject: Hockey, Ice
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L.’s 15-game suspension of Boston’s Shawn Thornton will hardly be the last word in the sport’s endless soul-searching over the role of the enforcer.
snippet: The N.H.L.’s 15-game suspension of Boston’s Shawn Thornton will hardly be the last word in the sport’s endless soul-searching over the role of the enforcer.
